meta.title: OX Services | Premium Infrastructure & Bespoke Finishes
meta.description: OX Services delivers excellence in aluminum joinery, solar PV systems, bespoke furniture, and EPDM rubber roofing. We build with durability, technical precision, and energy efficiency.
meta.keywords: aluminum joinery, solar panels, bespoke furniture, EPDM roofing, commercial construction, energy efficiency, sustainable building

hero.heading: Building Excellence from the Ground Up
hero.subHeading: Fusing technical precision with sophisticated design, we engineer and install premium infrastructure and bespoke interior finishes for the modern era.
hero.backgroundImageAlt: Facade of a modern high-rise building with glass and aluminum, reflecting the sky at dusk.

services.heading: Our Expertise
services.subHeading: Delivering specialized solutions engineered for durability, efficiency, and aesthetic excellence in residential and commercial infrastructure.

items.title: Aluminum Joinery & Glazing
items.description: Harnessing technical precision, our windows and doors offer unparalleled thermal performance and durability, enhancing any architectural design.
items.altText: A close-up of a sleek, modern aluminum window frame with high-performance glazing.

items.title: Solar PV Systems
items.description: Achieve superior energy efficiency with our integrated solar solutions. We design and install high-yield PV systems for commercial and residential properties.
items.altText: A vast array of solar panels installed on the roof of a modern commercial building.

items.title: Bespoke Furniture & Doors
items.description: Our master craftsmen create durable, bespoke interior pieces that perfectly align with your architectural vision, from executive desks to statement doors.
items.altText: A custom-crafted wooden table and chairs in a minimalist, high-end office interior.

items.title: EPDM Rubber Membrane Roofing
items.description: Our industrial-grade EPDM rubber membrane provides a seamless, waterproof barrier with a 50-year life expectancy, ensuring ultimate durability and protection.
items.altText: A professional roofer applying a black EPDM rubber membrane to a large flat commercial roof.

portfolio.heading: Architectural Excellence in Action
portfolio.subHeading: A curated selection of projects showcasing our commitment to quality, precision, and innovative design.

projects.title: Corporate HQ Revitalization
projects.altText: A modern corporate headquarters featuring floor-to-ceiling aluminum and glass curtain walls.

projects.title: Urban Solar Integration
projects.altText: Rooftop solar panel installation on a city building, with the skyline in the background.

projects.title: Executive Boardroom
projects.altText: An executive boardroom with a large, custom-made wooden conference table and integrated technology.

cta.heading: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.subHeading: Contact our team of experts today for a consultation and discover how we can elevate your infrastructure.

contact.heading: Request a Proposal
contact.subHeading: Fill out the details below and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
